author: ajsutton
content:
I'm having trouble getting a geth node working properly on the mainnet shadow fork.  I'm using the ethereum/client-go:latest docker image and it's accepting all the `--authrpc.*` type options but isn't actually listening on port 8551 (despite having `--authrpc.port=8551`).  Genesis file has:
```
    "mergeForkBlock": 14660963,
    "terminalTotalDifficulty": 46089003871917200000000,
```

It's up and sync'd with mainnet fine, I just can't seem to find the magic incantation to get it to start the engine api.  The same setup and options worked fine with the goerli shadow forks.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Yeah the ttd in mainnet genesis doesn't work, you need to use the ttd override. But for the override you need to use this branch: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/24646/files
